pkgmetadata.longdescription: # PyCareer## Python Jobs in Your Terminal!### Usage:You can query Python jobs based on 2 parameters:- tag- location```pythonpycareer --tag Senior --location Remote```Default amount of jobs returned is 5 but you can configure this limit:```pythonpycareer --tag Senior --location Remote --limit 10```All jobs are sorted by date, so you will see the most recent jobs first.### Installation:```pythonpip install pycareer```Now you will have access to the CLI.So, just open your terminal and let's go!Find your perfect job!Sign up on https://www.pycareer.io and list your profile! Employers will chase you for your Python skills!
